author: jukka
msg: JCR-2712: Dirty Internal State on Transaction-Rollback during Global Transaction (container managed transaction)
Make sure that the versioning lock covers an entire XA transaction
even when the transaction manager does not call prepare() before a
commit() or a rollback(). This also guarantees that proper cleanup
will happen during a rollback() without a preceding prepare().

author: gmcdonald
msg: Add two committers, remove separate PMC list, reverse sort News (adding news for the two new committers), reorganise some tables

msg: CLEREZZA-306: fixed error causing duplication of entries
